About.AboutUsDesc: GigglesWare! is all about simplyfying the family day care management. We think moving a family day care from paper sheets and reports to Giggles Ware would simplify, streamline, organize and manage things while concentrating on kids. Giggles Ware also helps parents check the daily sheets, reports and search logs.
About.AboutUsSubDesc: BEST OF ALL, GIGGLES ARE FREE AND SO IS GIGGLES WARE
About.DayCareDesc: Register your family day care with us one time. Add any number of kids to the day care. Manage their reports and daily sheets for all daily activities. Moniter the kids attendance. Search and analyze the reports for improvements.
About.ForParentsDesc: As a Parent, search for your email provided to the day care and create an account with us for one time. You will be able to access your kids daily reports, activities sheets and other information. Emails about the same will be send at the end of the day.
About.DesktopNotEnoughDesc: What better way to access GigglesWare on the run than using our Mobile Apps!
About.DesktopNotEnoughSubDesc: Check Out out Android App and Apple iPhone App
